solution_line_template: There are {population_delaware} / {people_per_group} = <<{population_delaware}/{people_per_group}={num_groups}>>{num_groups} groups of {people_per_group} people in the state.
These groups will have {num_groups} * {cell_phones_per_group} = <<{num_groups}*{cell_phones_per_group}={total_cell_phones}>>{total_cell_phones} cell phones.
